title: Fast & Furious: Crossroads – v1.0.0.0.0790 + Launch Pack DLC [Monkey Repack]
body:
Fast & Furious: Crossroads – v1.0.0.0.0790 + Launch Pack DLC [Monkey Repack]


Genres/Tags: Action, Shooter, Driving, Third-person, 3D
Companies: Slightly Mad Studios, Bandai Namco Entertainment
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI10
Original Size: 82.1 GB
Repack Size: from 30 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: Google Drive (Uploaded by hermietkreeft)
  • Filehosters: Google Drive + many others (Uploaded by LaRoyal, NOT compatible with other mirrors)
  • Filehoster: Google Drive (Uploaded by Parnex)
  • Filehosters: DropArk + NitroFlare + MegaUp (Uploaded by Vikky793, not compatible with torrent)

    • Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

    Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


    Repack Features

    • Based on Fast.and.Furious.Crossroads-CODEX ISO release: codex-fast.and.furious.crossroads.iso (88,114,003,968 bytes)
    • Launch Pack DLC is included and activated. Season Pass DLCs are not released yet, so it’s not counted here
    • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
    • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
    • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading of international game logo videos and movies in 4K resolution
    • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 82.1 to 30~31.5 GB, depending on selected components)
    • Installation heavily depends on free RAM, HDD/SSD speed and takes from 8 minutes on 16-threads CPU, SSD and 32 GB of RAM up to 40 minutes on 4-threads CPU and 8 GB of RAM
    • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
    • HDD space after installation: up to 85 GB
    • Use “Language Selector.exe” in game root to change the game language
    • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

    Game Description

    Caught up in a dangerous world of organized crime, three small-time garage owners find themselves at a crossroads. In a quest for vengeance, their destinies collide with a cast of familiar faces who share the same adversary.[b]

    Game Features

    [/b]
    • Rev-up for an official new chapter in the Fast & Furious saga as Dom, Letty and Roman return to put YOU at the center of the story.
    • Speed through thrilling blockbuster action across the globe in cars taken from the movies, all curated by Dennis McCarthy, the official Fast & Furious car coordinator.
    • Experience intense cinematic heists and deploy new and familiar gadgets from the movies.
    • Level up to unlock cars, paint, wraps, sprays, plates, gadgets, and more.

    Why this repack is called “Monkey Repack”?

    Most resources of FFC are encrypted and while proper files (re)compression is possible, it’s very slow (around 3-4 hours on a generic 4-threaded PC), but gives only 5 GB lesser size. So only basic compression was applied, and that any monkey can do.
